level.heading: No agency power of member as member.

level.text: A member shall not be an agent of a limited liability company solely by reason of being a member.
A person's status as a member shall not prevent or restrict law other than this chapter from imposing liability on a limited liability company because of the person's conduct.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 301 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
